Luke Ho, Money Maverick at Money MaverickLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 06 Apr 2019Unless you're graduating soon, dump it in somewhere liquid like an ETF or REIT if you want it to grow readily, or SSB if you want to figure it out later.0 comments0
